solution_line_template: An even split is {split_percent_text}%. If the monthly subscription is ${monthly_subscription_cost}, but I pay only {split_percent_text}% that means I pay every month ${monthly_subscription_cost}*{split_percent_text}%=$<<{monthly_subscription_cost}*{split_percent_text}*{percent_factor}={monthly_payment}>>{monthly_payment}

We know that in 1 year there are {months_per_year} months. Therefore if each month I pay ${monthly_payment}, in {months_per_year} months I'd pay ${monthly_payment}*{months_per_year}=$<<{monthly_payment}*{months_per_year}={total_yearly_payment}>>{total_yearly_payment}
